title: [Gameplay] Caitlyn's autos do damage before the animation has started
body:
Playing Officer Caitlyn, my auto's were often doing damage before the animation had started, giving me an advantage in trades. 

1. Play **Officer Caitlyn** - ~~Only skin I tried ~~ **Confirmed on Safari Caitlyn as well**
2. Auto Attack a minion/champion 

**[Success Rate] - 6/10**

replies.body: I discovered the same issue, in my case i was using Safari Caitlyn, so I assume it's a champion bug, not related to the skin.
This has been a known Caitlyn bug for years. I notice it on more than just her safari skin tho
